message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to let it go for $50. It's a great deal!
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, thanks.
This product is one of the best I have! It's a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not willing to pay full price for a product with unknown quality. I'd like to wait for a better offer or a hint about its quality.
I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90. But I'll also give you a hint: this product has a unique feature that sets it apart from the rest.
I'll take the offer! $90 is a good price for a product with a unique feature, and I'm willing to take a chance on it.

I know you just got a great deal on the previous product, but this one is a different story. I'm willing to let it go for $80, but I'm not sure I can do any better than that. It's a decent product, but not as special as the last one.
I'm not sure I want to spend $80 on a product that's not as special as the last one. I'll pass for now and wait for a better offer or more information about its quality.

I've been transparent with you about the quality of my products so far, and I want to continue being honest. This one is not my best work. I'm willing to let it go for $60, but I'm not sure you'll be happy with it.
Thanks for being honest with me, Alice. Based on your warning, I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather wait for a better offer or a higher-quality product.

I'm starting to think you're not interested in my lower-end products. I'm willing to let this one go for $40, but I have to warn you, it's not even close to the quality of the last high-end product you bought.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice, but $40 is still a lot of money for a low-quality product. I'll pass again and wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a high-quality product for you again! I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, but I'll throw in a special bonus: I'll give you a 10% discount if you buy it now. That's a $10 discount, making it $90.
The discount makes the offer more appealing, and I'm willing to take another chance on a high-quality product. I'll take the offer and hope for the best!
